paper_title.en: ON INTERCONNECTION NETWORKS FOR PARALLEL COMPUTERS

description.en: In this paper, we present new results involving interconnection networks for parallel computers based on fractals of rings and fractals of r-pies. Let d be the greatest distance in the network, and let l be the number of circuits connected to an arbitrary processor. It is well known for hypercube networks (i.e., the 2-ary it-cube) that both d and l equal log(2) N, where N is the number of processors. In this paper we present alternative network topologies with lower bounds on d and l. In particular, for the 5-ary n-cube, d and l are both strictly less than 0.86 log(2) N. For the 15-pie network, d and l are both strictly less than 0.77 log(2) N.

paper_title.en: Performance evaluation of loop-structured-computer by applying pairwise sequence alignment

description.en: We have developed a prototype dataflow computer called a loop-structured-computer (LSC). It consists of several dataflow processing elements (PEs) connected in the unidirectional loop configuration and enable parallel processing with dataflow paradigm. In order to measure the computing times and evaluate the speed-up of the LSC, we employ the pairwise sequence alignment in bioinformatics as a benchmark application. The pairwise sequence alignment problem can be solved by applying the dynamic programming algorithm. We implemented the problem by dynamic programming into the LSC with 72 PEs. We tested two types of allocation (line- and node-based modes), with varying the number of PEs, and evaluating the speed-up. We found that computing time was shortened sharply and the speed-up with the "node-based" allocation mode attained more than one half of the ideal speed-up. To our knowledge, this is the first attempt to implement the dynamic programming pairwise alignment of biological sequences on a dataflow LSC.

research_project_title.ja: 自己修復型プロセッサの開発

description.ja: プロセッサ（並列コンピュータ含む）の故障検出を動的に行い,故障の発生に対して,故障を回避するように再構成を行って,信頼性の高いプロセッサを構築する。そして,高信頼性組み込みシステム用のプロセッサに応用する。
